feed.title: Track Awesome Game Remakes Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: Actively maintained open-source game remakes.

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2024
entry.content:
Strategy

  • OpenE2140 (‚≠ê43) - Remake of Earth 2140 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • OpenKrush (‚≠ê107) - Remake of KKnD (Krush, Kill 'n' Destroy) and KKnD2 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • OpenSA (‚≠ê106) - Remake of Swarm Assault based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • Shattered Paradise (‚≠ê73) - Remake of C&C Tiberian Sun based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • Romanov's Vengeance (‚≠ê300) - Remake of C&C Red Alert 2 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
entry.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Oct 21 - Oct 27, 2024

  • sm64js (‚≠ê6) - Super Mario 64 reimplementation in JavaScript.

entry.content:
Online

  • ACEmulator - A custom, completely from-scratch open source server emulator for Asheron‚Äôs Call built on C#. üé¥

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on May 13 - May 19, 2024
entry.content:
Arcade

  • C-Dogs SDL (‚≠ê960) - Classic overhead run-and-gun game. üé¥
  • Open Kick-Off (‚≠ê46) - Rewriting attempt of the cult football game Kick Off 2. üé¥
  • OpenTyrian (‚≠ê489) - An open-source port of Tyrian from Turbo Pascal to C. üé¥
  • Taisei (‚≠ê1.4k) - Fan-made, open-source clone of the Touhou series. üé¥
  • The Great Escape in C (‚≠ê119) - Classic ZX Spectrum game The Great Escape in portable C. üé¥

FPS

  • Chocolate Doom (‚≠ê2.1k) - Source port that is minimalist, historically accurate and includes ports of Heretic and Hexen, and Strife. üé¥
  • ClassiCube (‚≠ê1.7k) - Minecraft Classic compatible client written in C from scratch. üé¥
  • Doom Legacy - One of the most popular DOOM source ports, which enhances it with things like TCP/IP networking, OpenGL renderer etc. üé¥
  • DoomRetro (‚≠ê718) - Classic, refined DOOM source port for Windows PC. üé¥
  • Doomsday Engine (‚≠ê281) - Source port of id Software's DOOM I/II and Raven Software's Heretic and Hexen. üé¥
  • FreeCS - Free-software re-implementation of Counter-Strike 1.5 running on the FTEQW engine. üé¥
  • Freedoom (‚≠ê1.2k) - Free software FPS based on the classic DOOM engine. üé¥
  • GZDoom (‚≠ê2.8k) - Modder-friendly OpenGL and Vulkan source port based on the DOOM engine. üé¥
  • Odamex (‚≠ê233) - Online multiplayer DOOM port with a strong focus on the original gameplay while providing a breadth of enhancements. üé¥
  • The Eternity Engine (‚≠ê249) - Advanced DOOM source port. üé¥
  • Zandronum - Multiplayer oriented port, based off Skulltag, for Doom and Doom II. Also runs Heretic, Hexen and Strife. üé¥

Online

  • 2006rebotted (‚≠ê29) - A 2006 RuneScape 2 Emulation Server. üé¥
  • 2004scape - A free & open-source remake of 2004 era RuneScape 2. üé¥
  • 2009scape - A free & open-source remake of 2009 era RuneScape 2. üé¥
  • FreeSO (‚≠ê889) - Reimplementation of The Sims Online, targetted mainly at mobile devices. üé¥
  • MineClone2 - Stable, moddable & free/libre clone of Minecraft based on the Minetest engine. üé¥
  • OpenRSC - Open source accurate RuneScape Classic (2001-2003) game server in Java, based on recorded data and videos. üé¥
  • RSC-C (‚≠ê98) - Rewrite of the RuneScape Classic (2001-2003) game client in portable C. üé¥
  • RuneLite (‚≠ê5k) - Open source Old School RuneScape (OSRS) client. üé¥
  • Ryzom Core (‚≠ê382) - Ryzom Core contains the whole code (client, server, tools) used to make the commercial MMORPG Ryzom. üé¥

Platformer

  • Commander Genius - Modern Interpreter for the Commander Keen Games. üé¥
  • The Secret Chronicles of Dr. M (‚≠ê214) - Adaptation of Secret Mario Chronicles. üé¥

Racing

  • wipEout Rewrite (‚≠ê2.8k) - This is a re-implementation of the 1995 PSX game wipEout. üé¥

Strategy

  • Ancient Beast (‚≠ê1.8k) - Spiritual successor to Heroes of Might and Magic III focusing on combat; matched based eSport.
  • OpenHV (‚≠ê938) - Open-source implementation of Hard Vacuum. üé¥
  • Open Panzer (‚≠ê168) - HTML5 Panzer General 2. üé¥
  • OpenTTD (‚≠ê7k) - OpenTTD is a transport simulation game based upon the popular game Transport Tycoon Deluxe, written by Chris Sawyer. üé¥
  • Warzone 2100 (‚≠ê3.4k) - Free and open-source real time strategy game. üé¥
entry.summary: 33 awesome projects updated on May 13 - May 19, 2024

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Mar 18 - Mar 24, 2024
entry.content:
FPS

  • SurrealEngine (‚≠ê952) - The goal of this project is to reimplement enough of the original Unreal Engine to make the Unreal Tournament (UT99) maps playable.

Simulator

  • Free Stars: The Ur-Quan Masters - Open source version of the classic Star Control 2.

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Jan 01 - Jan 07, 2024
entry.content:
RPG

  • Abyss Engine (‚≠ê163) - Abyss Engine is a game engine designed to run games similar to 2000's style ARPGs such as Diablo II.
  • Zelda3 (‚≠ê4.4k) - This is a reverse engineered clone of Zelda 3 - A Link to the Past.

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Jan 16 - Jan 22, 2023
entry.content:
Racing

  • Vange-rs (‚≠ê454) - The idea of this project is to replicate the old look and behavior of Vangers, but with native hardware acceleration for the graphics.

Strategy

  • Stone Kingdoms - A real-time strategy game made with L√ñVE based on the original Stronghold by Firefly studios.
  • VanillaConquer (‚≠ê415) - Command and Conquer and Red Alert original release source port based on the remaster source code drop.

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Jul 26 - Aug 01, 2021
entry.content:
Action

  • Rigel Engine (‚≠ê952) - Modern reimplementation of the classic DOS game Duke Nukem II in C++.

FPS

  • BetterSpades (‚≠ê264) - Ace Of Spades open source implementation that runs on older machines.
  • FTEQW - FPS Engine for Quake 1, QuakeWorld, Quake 2, Hexen II & Quake III Arena.

Online

  • Space Station 14 (‚≠ê3.2k) - Space Station 14 is a revived attempt at a Space Station 13 remake.

entry.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Mar 16 - Mar 22, 2020
entry.content:
Action

  • Carnage3D (‚≠ê499) - Reimplementation of Grand Theft Auto.
  • donut (‚≠ê443) - Reimplementation of The Simpsons: Hit & Run in modern C++ and modern OpenGL.
  • OpenJK (‚≠ê2.1k) - Community effort to maintain and improve Jedi Academy and Jedi Outcast by Raven Software.
  • OpenLara (‚≠ê4.9k) - Classic Tomb Raider open-source engine.
  • OpenMB (‚≠ê128) - Role-playing game engine for Taleworlds' Mount&Blade Series.
  • OpenTomb (‚≠ê1.4k) - Original Tomb Raider 1-5 experience with contemporary updates, features and additions.
  • remc2 (‚≠ê122) - Reverse engineering of Magic Carpet 2 from Assembler.
  • San Andreas Unity (‚≠ê2.4k) - Reimplementation of GTA: San Andreas game engine in Unity.
  • TOMB5 (‚≠ê499) - Tomb Raider: Chronicles disassembly translated to C source code.

Adventure

  • ScummVM (‚≠ê2.5k) - Allows you to run certain classic graphical point-and-click adventure games such Maniac Mansion and Monkey Island.

Arcade

  • Barbarian - Open-source clone of Barbarian: The Ultimate Warrior.
  • Mr.Boom (‚≠ê207) - 8 player Bomberman clone for RetroArch/Libretro.
  • OpenClonk (‚≠ê362) - Multiplayer action game where you control small and nimble humanoids.
  • Zelda Classic (‚≠ê9) - A game and editing tool that lets you create custom Legend of Zelda quests.

FPS

  • Allegiance (‚≠ê87) - Allegiance is RTS and FPS Space Combat game.
  • CatacombGL (‚≠ê165) - Windows source port of Catacomb 3D and the Catacomb Adventure series.
  • DukeGDX - Duke Nukem 3D port.
  • ECWolf - Port of Wolfenstein 3D based on Wolf4SDL.
  • ezQuake (‚≠ê286) - Combining the features of all modern QuakeWorld clients, ezQuake makes QuakeWorld easier to start and play.
  • Hexen II: Hammer of Thyrion - Cross-platform port of the Hexen II game.
  • ioquake3 (‚≠ê2.6k) - The free software FPS engine that can be used to play Quake 3, or make your own game.
  • NBlood (‚≠ê671) - Port of the classic FPS Blood.
  • OpenSpades (‚≠ê1.2k) - Compatible client of Ace of Spades, a voxel FPS.
  • QuakeSpasm - A modern, cross-platform Quake game engine.
  • RBDOOM-3-BFG (‚≠ê1.6k) - Doom 3 BFG Edition with soft shadows, cleaned up source, Linux and 64 bit Support.
  • RedneckGDX - Port of Redneck Rampage.
  • Tyrquake (‚≠ê45) - Libretro port of Tyrquake.
  • Yamagi Quake II (‚≠ê913) - Enhanced client for id Software's Quake II with focus on offline and coop gameplay.

Online

  • Meridian 59 (‚≠ê458) - The first 3D MMORPG, released in 1996 and open sourced in 2012. The original codebase for Meridian 59.
  • Opengate - Remake of Jumpgate.

RPG

  • Arx Libertatis (‚≠ê1k) - Cross-platform port of Arx Fatalis, a first-person role-playing game.
  • Barony (‚≠ê590) - Open source release of Barony.
  • BtBuilder (‚≠ê44) - An open source implementation of the Bard's Tale Construction Set.
  • Daggerfall Unity (‚≠ê3.1k) - Recreation of Daggerfall in the Unity engine.
  • Devilution (‚≠ê8.9k) - Reconstructed form of Diablo's original source code.
  • DevilutionX (‚≠ê8.8k) - Diablo build for modern operating systems.
  • DGEngine (‚≠ê263) - Implementation of the Diablo game engine.
  • Exult (‚≠ê589) - Project to recreate Ultima 7 for modern operating systems.
  • Falltergeist (‚≠ê883) - Crossplatform Fallout 2 game engine writen in C++ and SDL.
  • Freeablo (‚≠ê2.2k) - Open-source implementation of the Diablo engine.
  • FreeFT (‚≠ê172) - Real-time, isometric action game engine inspired by Fallout Tactics.
  • GemRB (‚≠ê1.1k) - Portable open-source reimplementation of the Infinity Engine (used by Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale and more).
  • OpenGothic (‚≠ê1.3k) - Reimplementation of Gothic 2: Night of the Raven.
  • OpenMW (‚≠ê5.8k) - Reimplementation of the Morrowind game engine.
  • OpenTESArena (‚≠ê1.2k) - Modern engine reimplementation of The Elder Scrolls: Arena by Bethesda Softworks.
  • OpenVIII (‚≠ê667) - Final Fantasy VIII engine implementation in C#.
  • REGoth (‚≠ê474) - An open source reimplementation of zEngine the engine behind Gothic and Gothic II.
  • Riiablo (‚≠ê1k) - Diablo II remade using Java and LibGDX.
  • sfall (‚≠ê377) - A set of engine modifications for the classic game Fallout 2.
  • Shockolate (‚≠ê838) - Same great System Shock, new great taste.
  • UAlbion (‚≠ê144) - Remake of 1995 Albion.
  • WitchavenGDX - Witchaven Java port.
  • xoreos (‚≠ê1.1k) - Implementation of BioWare's Aurora engine and its derivatives (used by Neverwinter Nights, The Witcher and more).
  • zorkClone (‚≠ê17) - Reimplementation of the original Zork game developed by Infocom.

Platformer

  • Alive Reversing (‚≠ê381) - Reimplementation of Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus.
  • Jazz¬≤ Resurrection (‚≠ê522) - Reimplementation of Jazz Jackrabbit 2.
  • Lionheart Remake (‚≠ê80) - Java remake of Lionheart Amiga game.
  • NXEngine-evo (‚≠ê515) - Rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).
  • Prince-Monogame (‚≠ê46) - Monogame implementation of Prince of Persia 2.
  • SDLPoP (‚≠ê1.2k) - Port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version.
  • VVVVV (‚≠ê7.8k) - The source code to VVVVVV.

Racing

  • DreeRally (‚≠ê93) - Death Rally engine reimplementation.
  • OpenNFS (‚≠ê679) - Attempt to recreate the classic Need for Speed Games (1-6).
  • Vangers (‚≠ê702) - Racing/RPG hybrid made open-source by its creators, written in C++.

Simulator

  • DXX-Rebirth (‚≠ê536) - Source port of the Descent and Descent 2 Engines for Windows, macOS, Linux.
  • FS2Open (‚≠ê429) - FreeSpace2 Source Code Project.
  • Librelancer (‚≠ê536) - Reimplementation of the 2003 space game Freelancer.

Strategy

  • Antares (‚≠ê104) - Remake of Ares, a tactical space combat game.
  • CivOne (‚≠ê257) - Implementation of Sid Meier's Civilization.
  • CorsixTH (‚≠ê4.2k) - Clone of Theme Hospital with support for modern operating systems, high resolutions and much more.
  • Cortex Command Community Project Source (‚≠ê204) - Community-driven effort to continue the development of Cortex Command.
  • FreeCol - Turn-based strategy game based on the old game Colonization.
  • Jagged Alliance Stracciatella (‚≠ê480) - Makes Jagged Alliance 2 available on a wide range of platforms.
  • Julius (‚≠ê3k) - Reimplementation of Caesar III.
  • KaM Remake (‚≠ê368) - RTS game remake of Knights and Merchants written in Delphi from scratch.
  • KeeperRL (‚≠ê915) - Roguelike dungeon builder inspired by Dwarf Fortress.
  • openage (‚≠ê14k) - Clone of the Age of Empires II engine.
  • OpenApocalypse (‚≠ê539) - Rebuild of the X-COM: Apocalypse engine.
  • openblack (‚≠ê1.4k) - Reimplementation of Black & White.
  • OpenDUNE (‚≠ê1.6k) - Recreation of the popular game Dune II.
  • Open Fodder (‚≠ê483) - Open-source implementation of Cannon Fodder.
  • OpenLoco (‚≠ê1.5k) - Reimplementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion.
  • OpenRA (‚≠ê16k) - Implementation of the Red Alert engine using .NET/mono and OpenGL. Runs on Windows, Linux and macOS.
  • OpenRCT2 (‚≠ê14k) - Recreation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.
  • OpenSAGE (‚≠ê1.5k) - C# reimplementation of SAGE, the game engine used by a bunch of EA Pacific games, including Command & Conquer: Generals and Battle for Middle Earth.
  • OpenSC2K (‚≠ê5k) - Remake of SimCity 2000 by Maxis.
  • OpenXcom (‚≠ê2k) - Clone of UFO: Enemy Unknown and X-COM: Terror From the Deep.
  • OutpostHD (‚≠ê120) - Remake of Sierra On-Line's Outpost.
  • Race into Space (‚≠ê190) - Version of Interplay's Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space.
  • Return To The Roots (‚≠ê515) - Settlers II remake written in C++.
  • Sourcehold (‚≠ê267) - Implementation of Stronghold by Firefly Studios.
  • VCMI (‚≠ê5k) - Engine for Heroes of Might and Magic III.
  • Wargus (‚≠ê387) - Warcraft 2 Mod that allows you to play Warcraft 2 with the Stratagus engine.
  • Zed Online - Remake of the 1996 classic game Z.
entry.summary: 94 awesome projects updated on Mar 16 - Mar 22, 2020
